title: State Sensor Initialization PDR Schema (DSP0248 1.3.0, Clause 28.7)

PLDMTerminusHandle.description: uint16; Handle identifying PDRs for a specific PLDM terminus

sensorID.description: uint16; Unique ID of the sensor within the terminus

initConditions.description: bitfield8: Conditions for initialization/reinitialization. [7:5]=reserved, [4]=PLDM terminus online, [3]=system warm reset, [2]=system hard reset, [1]=PLDM subsystem power up, [0]=Initialization Agent restart/update

sensorEnable.description: enum8: Operational state after init (e.g., 0=enabled, 1=disabled); 0xFF=do not change

sensorInitMask.description: bitfield8: Which sensors require initialization. [7:0] for offsets 7 to 0: 1b=requires init, 0b=does not

sensorOpStateEventEnableMask.description: bitfield8: Enable operational state event messages. [7:0] for offsets 7 to 0: 1b=enable, 0b=disable

sensorStateEventEnableMask.description: bitfield8: Enable state event messages. [7:0] for offsets 7 to 0: 1b=enable, 0b=disable

sensorEventRearm.description: bitfield8: Rearm behavior. [7:0] for offsets 7 to 0: 1b=trigger event if mismatch, 0b=accept init value

stateValue0.description: uint8; Initialization value for sensor at offset 0 (0x00 if dummy)

stateValue1.description: uint8; Initialization value for sensor at offset 1 (0x00 if dummy)

stateValue2.description: uint8; Initialization value for sensor at offset 2 (0x00 if dummy)

stateValue3.description: uint8; Initialization value for sensor at offset 3 (0x00 if dummy)

stateValue4.description: uint8; Initialization value for sensor at offset 4 (0x00 if dummy)

stateValue5.description: uint8; Initialization value for sensor at offset 5 (0x00 if dummy)

stateValue6.description: uint8; Initialization value for sensor at offset 6 (0x00 if dummy)

stateValue7.description: uint8; Initialization value for sensor at offset 7 (0x00 if dummy)
